FemaleElf.synopsis: A couple of thugs are being briefed by their very corrupt Lawyer on how to not end up behind bars. This is the Lawyer's one liner
FemaleElf.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-9; 54; 207)- talk to the female elf.

HalfOrc.synopsis: A couple of thugs are being briefed by their very corrupt Lawyer on how to not end up behind bars. This is the half-orc thug's one liner
HalfOrc.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-9; 54; 207)- talk to the half orc

MaleElf.synopsis: A couple of thugs are being briefed by their very corrupt Lawyer on how to not end up behind bars. This is the elf thug's one liner
MaleElf.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-9; 54; 207)- talk to the male elf.

AD_ArmoryDialogue.synopsis: A couple of thugs are being briefed by their very corrupt Lawyer on how to not end up behind bars.
AD_ArmoryDialogue.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-9; 54; 207)- Dialogue should start automatically.

FemaleElf_1.speaker: Fentamia Viney
FemaleElf_1.text: No time to talk. I have clients to brief, and they're sharp as spoons.

HalfOrc_0.speaker: Civilian
HalfOrc_0.text: Going to have to rob so many more houses to pay this bloody lawyer.

HalfOrc_1.speaker: Civilian
HalfOrc_1.text: Leave it out. I've got a trial coming up and I need to rememberise my lines.
HalfOrc_1.context: NodeContext: gruff, dismissing player who has interrupted. 'Rememberise' is an attempt to say memorise that got mixed up with remember. Thinks it's the right word and should say it naturally.

MaleElf_0.speaker: Arborio Rolfin
MaleElf_0.text: I ain't saying nothing to nobody until I've had my trial.
MaleElf_0.context: NodeContext: keeping tight-lipped on the command of his lawyer

MaleElf_1.speaker: Arborio Rolfin
MaleElf_1.text: You won't get a word out of me.
MaleElf_1.context: NodeContext: keeping tight-lipped on the command of his lawyer

AD_ArmoryDialogue_1.speaker: Fentamia Viney
AD_ArmoryDialogue_1.text: Let's rehearse this one more time. Pretend I'm a Fist, and tell me what you were doing in the house.
AD_ArmoryDialogue_1.context: NodeContext: running out of patience - they've run through this many times before

AD_ArmoryDialogue_3.speaker: Civilian
AD_ArmoryDialogue_3.text: Well, your Fistliness, we broke down the door because it sounded like somebody was in trouble inside.
AD_ArmoryDialogue_3.context: NodeContext: 'Fistliness' is an attempt to show deference to a Flaming Fist - polite but clearly lying

AD_ArmoryDialogue_5.speaker: Arborio Rolfin
AD_ArmoryDialogue_5.text: The house was on fire. We were rescuing people.

AD_ArmoryDialogue_6.speaker: Fentamia Viney
AD_ArmoryDialogue_6.text: I spoke to a witness who says you entered the house before the fire started.

AD_ArmoryDialogue_0.speaker: Civilian
AD_ArmoryDialogue_0.text: Who said that? I'll break their bloody legs!

AD_ArmoryDialogue_2.speaker: Arborio Rolfin
AD_ArmoryDialogue_2.text: Err, what my friend means to say is that the witness must have been mistaken. Probably a drunk.
AD_ArmoryDialogue_2.context: NodeContext: trying to smooth over an outburst from his friend

AD_ArmoryDialogue_4.speaker: Fentamia Viney
AD_ArmoryDialogue_4.text: Better. I almost believed you this time.
AD_ArmoryDialogue_4.context: NodeContext: trying to be encouraging but not convinced
